channel.title: Client res
channel.description:
I need a little help changing my client res/size I've forgotten the word but err yeah, how to explain this... I want to move my actual game size to where I located the size thing? Forgotten the word once again. If you could help I would seriously appreciate it.
And no, I don't program servers anymore. Or any programming for that matter, sorry.
[center][IMG]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/4067/fgfgtgf.png[/img][/center]
